segments.text: I would like to take a trip to the beach this weekend .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: A trip to the beach would be fun . How is the weather going to be ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The forecast says that it will be warm on the weekend .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So do you think it'll be perfect weather for the beach ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It sounds like it will be .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I really hope it doesn't get cold .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That would ruin things , I want to go so badly .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The weather in California is unpredictable , so you never know .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That is true . The weather is constantly changing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It would be nice if the weather would never change .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That would be great , then we could plan things sooner .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: True . Predictable weather would make life easier .
segments.speaker: S2
